snippet: A Hollywood production company, Prospect Park, on Monday confirmed that the canceled "All My Children" and "One Life to Live" would live on in cyberspace.
abstract: A Hollywood production company, Prospect Park, on Monday confirmed that the canceled "All My Children" and "One Life to Live" would live on in cyberspace.

headline.main: Canceled ABC Soaps to be Reborn on the Web
headline.print_headline: 2 Soap Operas, Killed Off, Are Set for Resurrection
